loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes is a married woman with two children. She is 45 years old and two of her children are presently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Mercedes has a weaving business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years. Mercedes requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional pineapple fibres and other materials for her business.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional pineapple fibres and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Notre

texts.en:
Notre is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who  is 44 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish net, bamboo, and maintenance for her boat.

Notre has been in this business for 14 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish net, bamboo, and maintenance for her boat

loans.name: Eri

texts.en:
Eri is a twenty-three-year old married man with one child living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He used the previous loan to buy more sugar and soap to sell. 

He still operates a retail business of general merchandise, a salon, and a cocoa garden for supplementary income. He works very hard and he has great hopes of finishing his house.

He wants a loan to buy more merchandise, such as salt and cooking oil, among other items.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for sale.

loans.name: Joswa

texts.en:
Joswa is a fifty-five-year old married man with six children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. 

He started the business in 1974 and has kept it moving because of his hard work. He hopes to educate his children though he is affected by inadequate capital to do so. 

Joswa wants a loan to buy cows for slaughtering to sell.

loans.use: to buy cows for slaughtering to sell.

loans.name: Orupa

texts.en: Orupa is a 53-year-old married mother of six children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She used the previous loan to buy second-hand clothes for selling. Orupa still sells second-hand clothes to support her family. She has a vision of constructing a permanent house and educating her children. She is affected by high transport costs and limited capital hindering her business growth. She needs a loan to buy more second-hand clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy more second-hand clothes for selling.

loans.name: Firimon

texts.en:
Firimon is a 60-year-old married father of seven children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He operates a retail shop that sells general merchandise. He started this business to raise income for his family, especially to pay school fees for his children. Like other retailers, he meets the challenge of price fluctuations.
He wants a loan to buy sugar, rice and detergent for selling.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice and detergent to sell.

loans.name: Zema

texts.en: Zema is a 51-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband in Senaki district. Zema trades cheese products. She purchases cheese at wholesale prices and then resells with the price markup. Zema decided to start a husbandry business and requested a loan. The startup program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 1,000 GEL. With the received credit she will purchase a cow and will start producing dairy products. She will be able to increase the income of her family. Zema awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Hamlet

texts.ru: Хамлет мужчина 30 лет, женат, молодой отец троих детей. Он вырос в сельской местности и с ранних лет начал заниматься животноводством. У его отца была большая ферма, где он содержал крупных рогатых скот: коров, баранов, коз. Хамлет продолжает его дело. Хамлету приходится также подрабатывать таксистом вечерами, чтобы прокормить свою семью и пожилых родителей. Он планирует закупить корм для скота,но ему не хватает денег . Поэтому Хамлет обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Он надеется на положительный ответ со стороны МДО Арванд.
texts.en: Hamlet is 30 years old, married, and a young father of three children.  He was raised in the countryside and from a young age has been working in animal husbandry.  His father had a large farm where he raised cattle: cows, sheep, and goats.  Hamlet continues his father's business.  Hamlet also works as a taxi driver in the evenings in order to provide for his family and elderly parents.  He plans to purchase feed for his cattle, but he lacks sufficient funds.  For this reason Hamlet turned to MDO Arvand for financial support.  He is counting on a positive response from MDO Arvand.

loans.use: to buy feed for cattle

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana, de 74 años de edad, es una mujer muy respetada en su comunidad, estudió solamente hasta segundo grado, por la escasez de recursos en la que vivía, su pareja ya falleció, actualmente vive junto con su nuera, un nieto y la esposa de su nieto.

Juana, desde que era pequeña aprendió a trabajar para ganarse la vida, se crió en las algodoneras junto con sus hermanos, realizando todas las labores culturales que este cultivo exige, posteriormente en su juventud, anduvo de forma ambulante vendiendo frutas y verduras, también vendió carne de res.- Se acompañó a los 17 años de edad, actualmente ya no tiene fuerzas para trabajar, pero sus hijos le ayudan para que pueda cubrir las necesidades de la casa.

El préstamo solicitado es para arreglar el techo del corredor de su casa, pues ya se acerca el invierno y es el lugar donde ella sale a respirar y disfrutar de la tarde, a platicar junto con sus vecinas de la misma edad y no quiere que la lluvia le impida disfrutar de ese tiempo.

Juana, sueña con disfrutar en los últimos años de vida que le quedan, junto con sus hijos y nietos y ver que sus nietos se vayan desarrollando como personas de bien, para que sean un orgullo para ella y su comunidad.
texts.en:
Juana, 74 years old, is a very respected woman in her community. She only studied until the second grade due to the scarcity of resources in which she lived. Her partner passed away, and she currently lives with her daughter in law, a grandson, and her grandson’s wife.

Juana, since she was little, learned to work to make a living. She grew up on the cotton fields together with her brothers, carrying out all of the cultivation procedures that this crop entails. Later in her youth, she walked the streets selling fruits and vegetables and also sold beef. She got married when she was 17 years old. Now she does not have strength to work, but her children help her so that she can cover the needs of the house.

The requested loan is to fix the corridor roof in her house, since winter is coming and that is where she goes out to breathe and enjoy the afternoon and chat with her neighbors of the same age, and she doesn’t want the rain to impede her enjoyment of that time.

Juana dreams of enjoying the last years of her life with her children and grandchildren, and she wants to see her grandchildren develop as good people so they will be a pride to her and her community.

loans.use: to fix the corridor roof in her house.

loans.name: Sreytouch

texts.en:
A villager from a rural area located in Presh Vihea province’s Kulen district, Sreytouch is 31 years old and married. She has two children who are still too small for school. She has been working as a teacher for seven years.
 
This is Sreytouch's first loan with Kiva's partner VisionFund. She is applying for a loan of 1,400,000 KHR to buy household supplies. She hopes that this loan will enable her to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy household supplies

loans.name: Atofai

texts.en:
Atofai is a 29-year-old mother with four children and she has a small business of selling vegetables (cabbage, eggplant, cucumber) in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a  year. 

She has requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a water tank, a rake, a shovel, hand gloves, and safety boots to assist her in running the business. 

Atofai hopes to expand her business by using her profit in the near future. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a water tank, a rake, a shovel, hand gloves, and safety boots

loans.name: Ihana

texts.en:
Ihana is a 52-year-old mother with five children. She runs and operates a small convenience store in her village to earn a living. 

Ihana has requested a loan to buy a freezer, box of chicken, sack of flour, sack of sugar, sack of rice, box of tinned fish, box of vegetable oil, box of milk, and plastic bags to assist her run the business. 

She has been doing this for more than four years. Ihana became a member of SPBD in 2006.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, box of chicken, sack of flour, sack of sugar, sack of rice, box of tinned fish, box of vegetable oil, box of milk, and plastic bags

loans.name: Leutuva

texts.en:
Leutuva is 21 years old and single with one child. She runs a small business selling tomatoes, beans, cucumbers, etc., in her community and has been doing this for three years. 

Leutuva has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a spade, a rake, bush knives, weed spray, etc. 

She joined SPBD in 2010, to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Leutuva hopes to support her family financially and to save for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a spade, a rake, bush knives, weed spray, etc.

loans.name: Helder

texts.pt:
O senhor Hélder é técnico profissional publico tem 29 anos  casado pai de 2 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta o ensino primário e outro ainda menor, vive na casa própria.
Diz que com este crédito irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, ferro, portas, janelas para dar continuidade a sua obra. 
Diz que seu sonho e concluir a sua  obra, e fazer a faculdade licenciando se em ciências políticas para ajudar no desenvolvimento do pais.
Principais desafios sao financeiros  e o elevado custo de vida, para ultrapassa tem  uma conta onde faz depósitos como forma de poupar e que ira levantar mais créditos como forma de alcançar seus objectivos.
texts.en: Hélder, age 29, is a public administration professional. He is married and the father of two children, of whom one is in school and the other is not yet school-aged. His lives in his own house and says he will use this loan to buy cement, gravel, stone, rebar, doors, and windows to keep working on his construction project. His dream is to finish with the work and get a degree in political science to support the country's development. His main challenge is the high cost of living. To overcome this, he maintains a savings account and also plans to take out future loans to pursue his goals.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, stone, rebar, doors, and windows.

loans.name: Henriques

texts.pt:
O senhor Henriques  ė chefe de cozinha tem 40 anos de idade é casado e pai de 6 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta o ensino secundário  3 frequentam o ensino primário e 2 ainda menores, vive na casa própria.
Diz que com este crédito irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, ferro para dar continuidade a sua obra. 
Seu sonho é concluir a sua  obra, adquirir uma viatura para uso pessoal.
Principais desafios insuficiência de fundos e elevado custo de vida para ultrapassa los  tem  uma conta onde faz depósitos como forma de poupar sendo assim ira levantar mais créditos como forma de alcançar seus objectivos.
texts.en: Henriques is a 40-year-old head chef. He is married and the father of six children, of whom one is in high school, three are in elementary school, and two are not yet school-aged. He lives in his own house. He says that with this loan he will buy cement, gravel, stone, and rebar to keep working on his construction project. His dream is to finish with the work and buy a car for his personal use. His main challenges are a lack of funds and a high cost of living. To overcome this, he maintains a savings account and also plans to take out future loans in order to pursue his goals.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, stone, and rebar.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 60 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, shampoo, spices, coffee, bread, milk, sugar, egg, etc.

Emma has borrowed and paid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses

Emma aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, shampoo, spices, coffee, bread, milk, sugar, eggs, etc

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is 47 years old, married, and has three children, one of whom is in school.

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her pigs.

Anecita has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 62 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for her family.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store like canned goods, noodles, soap, soft drinks, breads, etc.

Teresita has been in this business for ten years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store like canned goods, noodles, soap, soft drinks, breads, etc

loans.name: Lenalyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Lenalyn works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling of native products business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and selling vegetables. Lenalyn is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more stock of native products like basket, brooms, plate, etc to sell for her buying and selling of native products business.

Lenalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of native products like basket, brooms, plate, etc to sell

loans.name: Annely

texts.en:
Annely is 38 years old and married with three children.  With two children in school, Annely works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Annely has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, sugar, canned goods, and other groceries. 

In the future she would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Manila

texts.en:
Manila is a widowed woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 52 years old and has three children who are presently in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines. Manila requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish net, bamboos, maintenance for her boat and other materials for her business.

Manila has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to pay for fish net, bamboo, maintenance for her boat, and other materials for her business

loans.name: Chanlynn

texts.en:
Chanlynn is 23 years old and has a partner with one child. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. 

Chanlynn has requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, sugar, yeast, cooking oil, a frying pan, etc. 

She joined SPBD in 2012, to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Chanlynn hopes to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sugar, yeast, cooking oil, a frying pan, etc.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 62 years old and married with seven children. She runs a small business selling cabbage and tomatoes in her community and has been doing this for three years. 

Susana has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a spade, weed spray, a rake, bush knives, etc. She joined SPBD in 2013, to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Susana will love continuing to do her business to support her family.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a spade, weed spray, a rake, bush knives, etc.

loans.name: Fialauia

texts.en:
Fialauia is a 36-year-old mother with three children, and she runs a small business of selling fried sausage and fried chicken in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Fialauia  has requested a loan to buy a box of chicken, box of sausage, tomato sauce, vegetable oil, a sack of flour, a container and a sack of rice, to assist her in running the business. Fialauia hopes to expand her business in the near future using her profit and hopes to provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy a box of chicken, box of sausage, tomato sauce, vegetable oil, a sack of flour, a container and a sack of rice.

loans.name: Fuifui

texts.en:
Fuifui is 39 years old and has a partner but no children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for three years. 

Fuifui has requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, sugar, yeast, cooking oil, a frying pan, etc. She joined SPBD in 2013, to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Fuifui hopes to build a small building for her business in front of her house.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sugar, yeast, cooking oil, a frying pan, etc.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.pt:
O senhor Fernando é auxiliar de oficina tem  30 anos de idade casado pai de 1 filho ainda menor  de idade além deste sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ele vive na casa própria.
Diz que com este credito ira comprar uma viatura para usar para transporte pessoal e para a sua família. 
Diz que seu sonho e melhorar as condições de sua casa dando um lar condigno a sua família.
Principais desafios insuficiência de fundos e elevado custo de vida para ultrapassa tem  uma conta onde faz depósitos como forma de poupar e que irá levantar mais créditos como forma de alcançar seus objectivos.
texts.en: Fernando, age 30, works in an office and is married with one son, who is not yet school-aged. In addition, he is responsible for a nephew who lives with him in his own house. He says that with this loan he will buy a car for he and his family's personal use. His dream is to improve his house and provide a dignified home for his family. His main challenges are a lack of funds and the high cost of living. To overcome this, he maintains a savings account and plans to take out future loans to pursue his goals.

loans.use: to buy a car for personal use and to rent.

loans.name: Fiapule

texts.en:
Fiapule is 45 years old. She runs a small business of selling ice cakes in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Fiapule has requested for a loan to buy a sack of sugar, plastic bags, ice bag, Coolio cooler boxes, and containers to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to expand her business in the near future. Fiapule  became a member of SPBD in 2009.

loans.use: to buy a sack of sugar, plastic bags, ice bags, Coolio cooler boxes, and containers

loans.name: Elisapeta

texts.en:
Elisapeta is a 39-year-old mother with five children and has a small business of selling vegetables (cabbage, eggplant, cucumber) in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a  year. 

She has requested for a loan to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a water tank, a rake, a shovel, hand gloves, and safety boots to assist her in running the business. 

Elisapeta hopes to expand her business by using her profit in the near future. She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a water tank, a rake, a shovel, hand gloves, and safety boots

loans.name: Olivio

texts.pt:
O Sr. Olivio de 24 anos de idade casado e pai de 2 filhos 1 estando a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e outro è menor de idade para frequentar a escola. Ele e Avicultor na empresa a mais de 3 anos.
Com o primeiro emprestimo foi aplicado para a legalizacao do espaco e iniciar com a construcao da sua casa e com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construcao (Àrea, cimentos, pedra e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para terminar com a construcao da sua casa.
texts.en: Olivio, age 24, is married and the father of two children, one of whom is in first grade and the other who is not yet school-aged. He has been a poultry farmer with a company for more than three years. With his first loan, he obtained title for a lot and began building his house. With this loan, he will buy construction materials, such as gravel, cement, and stone, and pay contract labor in order to complete the construction work on his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as gravel, concrete, and stone, and to pay for contract labor.

loans.name: Pereise

texts.en:
Pereise is 34 years old with one child. She operates a business of selling bananas and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

She has requested a loan to buy banana tubes (seedlings), taro roots (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, a water tank, hand gloves, a rake, a shovel, and chemicals to assist her in running the business. 

She joined SPBD in 2014, and hopes to use her  profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy banana tubes (seedlings), taro roots (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, a water tank, hand gloves, a rake, a shovel, and chemicals

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
O senhor Antonio  é seguranca  e agricultor, de  56 anos de idade casado com duas esposas e é pai de 16  filhos dos quais 8 a estudar, 6 já maiores de idade e a viverem nas suas casas 2 ainda menores de idade  além destes sustenta 3 também 3 netos que vivem com ele na casa própria.
Diz que com este credito ira comprar sementes de milho, feijao, amendoim, couve para ampliar a sua produção. 
Diz que seu sonho é oficializar sua relação casando, ter um negocio na sua casa para tal precisaria de fazer um estabelecimento como forma de reforçar a renda familiar.
Principais desafios insuficiência de fundos e elevado custo de vida para ultrapassá los faz xitique  e tem  uma conta onde faz depósitos como forma de poupar e que irá levantar mais créditos como forma de alcançar seus objectivos,além de ser segurança e também pensionista militar e mecânico.
texts.en: Antonio is a 56-year-old security guard and farmer. He is married with two wives and the father of 16 children, of whom eight are in school, six are adults living on their own, and two are not yet school-aged. In addition, he also provides for three grandchildren who live with him in his own house. He says that with this loan he will buy seeds for maize, beans, peanuts, and kale to increase his yield. His dream is to formalize his relationship in marriage and have his own in-home business so as to supplement his household income. His main challenges are a lack of funds and the high cost of living. To overcome this, he has access to a xitique [traditional savings system] and a savings account. In addition to being a military pensioner and mechanic, he plans to take out future loans in order to pursue his goals

loans.use: to buy seeds for maize, beans, peanuts, and kale.

loans.name: Selena

texts.en:
Selena is 50 years old with two children. She runs a business of selling bananas and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Selena has requested for a loan to buy banana tube (seedlings), taro roots (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel and chemicals to assist her in running the business. She joined SPBD in 2005, and hopes to use her profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy banana tube (seedlings), taro roots (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel and chemicals.

loans.name: Suhrob

texts.ru: Это Сухроб. Ему 38 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Он вместе семьей проживает в районе Спитамен. Жена домохозяйка, и занимается земледелием. Дети ходят в школу. Сам Сухроб ответственный и честный человек. У него есть 0,50 Га земельный участок, где она посадил пшеницу. В работе ему помогает жена. 6 лет Сухроб занимается земледелием. Сейчас Сухроб планирует открыть свой новый бизнес в районе, заниматься сварщиком. Он обратился за кредитом, чтобы купить листов железо и сварочные материалы для сварки лопаты, кетмень и грабли для работы сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Сухроб этих инструментов продает жителям района. Это кредит поможет ему начать новый бизнес.
texts.en: This is Suhrob. He is 38 years old, married and has three children. He and his family live in the Spitamen district. His wife is a homemaker and involved in farming. The children go to school. Suhrob is a responsible and honest person. He has 0.50 hectares of land, where he planted wheat. His wife helps him with the work. Suhrob has been involved in farming for 6 years. Now Suhrob is planning to start a new business in his district and work as a welder. He requested this loan to purchase two sheets of metal and welding materials, and also shovels, hoes and rakes for his agricultural work. Suhrob sells these tools to the district residents. This loan will help him to start a new business.

loans.use: to purchase two sheets of metal and welding materials, and also shovels, hoes and rakes

loans.name: Abduvohid

texts.ru:
Абдувохид 37 лет. Он молодой житель района Спитамен. Абдувохид женат и отец троих детей. Он трудолюбивый человек. Его жена домохозяйка, она ведет домашние хозяйство и присматривает за детьми. У Абдувохид имеется 0,50 Га земельный участок. Он сажает пшеницу. Этой деятельностью он занят 5 лет. Абдувохид так много старается, чтобы обеспечить семью и улучшить жилищные условия семьи. 
Он хочет открыть свой бизнес у себя дома. Абдувохид планирует взять кредит и за счет кредита приобрести станок для резки дерево. Станок (пильщик) нужен ему для изготовления доски и тонкие доски для покрытия крыш. Поэтому Абдулвохид обратился к Вам за кредитом с большими надеждами. Он верит в Вас и надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Abduvohid is 37 years old. He is a young resident of the Spitamen district. Abduvohid is married and a father of three children. He is a hardworking person. His wife is a homemaker and runs the household and looks after the children. Abduvohid has 0.50 hectares of land. He plants wheat and has been involved in this business for 5 years. Abduvohid tries very hard to provide for his family and improve the family's living conditions. He wants to open a new business at home. Abduvohid plans to obtain a loan and use it to purchase wood cutting equipment. He needs the sawing tool to make planks and thin panels for covering roofs. This is why Abduvohid came to You for the loan with high hopes. He believes in You and hopes for Your support.

loans.use: to purchase wood sawing equipment

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Lolita works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from buying and selling dried coconut meat. 

Lolita is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell at her vegetable stall.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Lolita has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell at her vegetable stall.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en:
Julita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fruit and vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

Julita requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fruits and vegetables for resale.

Julita has been in this business for 14 years now.

In the future, Julita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Ana Marie

texts.en:
Ana Marie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Ana Marie has been in this business for eight years. She earns additional income from a general store.

Ana Marie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Rashel

texts.en:
Rashel is 44 years old and married with two children.

Shel is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Rashel has been raising pigs for nine years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF and, more recently, from Kiva to sustain it.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en:
Fozia is 41 years old. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her four children. Her husband has been working for a public sector organization for many years. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the family. Fozia provides sewing services and earns income to contribute with her husband to manage the household. 

She needs different kinds of items, e.g., needles, threads, pieces of cloth, machine oil, etc., for her business, but due to insufficient financial means, she is unable to purchase these accessories. Therefore, she has applied for a Kiva loan from Kiva's field partner, BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her to purchase these accessories and also will be helpful for her in increasing monthly sales and profit by being able to provide better sewing services.

Fozia is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase different items for her business, such as needles, thread, pieces of cloth, etc.

loans.name: Maria Marzepan

texts.en:
Maria Marzepan is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Maria Marzepan is 49 years old and has two children who are presently in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish net, bamboo, and other materials for her fishing business.

Maria Marzepan has been in this business for 28 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish net, bamboo, and other materials for her fishing business

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 53 years old, married, and has five children. 

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds, vitamins, and vaccines for her pigs.

Mary Jane has been raising pigs for 26 years now, and has borrowed 20 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Araceli

texts.en:
Araceli is a 47-year-old married woman with seven children. Four of her children are in school, and she is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Araceli has been in this business for ten years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 54 years old and has four children. She is married and has one child is still in school.

She is in the agricultural business  in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional pigs, sacks of feeds, and vitamins for her pigs.

Merlita has been in  business  for 10 years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs, sacks of feeds, and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Saipolua

texts.en:
Saipolua is 35 years old and a married with four children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for three years.

Saipolua has requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, sugar, yeast, cooking oil, a frying pan, etc. She joined SPBD in 2010, to gain access to capital. 

With her earnings, Saipolua will pay for her children's education and support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sugar, yeast, cooking oil, a frying pan, etc.

loans.name: Mataifono

texts.en:
Mataifono is 28 years old and has two children. She runs a business of selling bananas and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Mataifono has requested a loan to buy banana tubes (seedling), taro roots(seedlings), a wheelbarrow, a water tank, hand gloves, a rake, a shovel and chemicals to assist her running the business. She joined SPBD in 2010, and hopes to use her profits to expand her business and provide for her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to buy banana tubes (seedling), taro roots(seedlings), a wheelbarrow, a water tank, hand gloves, a rake, a shovel and chemicals.

loans.name: Petina

texts.en:
Petina is 53 years old and married with eight children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for four years.

Petina has requested a loan to buy a fishing net, torches, goggles, a spear, etc. She joined SPBD in 2010, to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Petina hopes to build a new house for her family and to save for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net, torches, goggles, a spear, etc.

loans.name: Dewi Fortuna Group

texts.en:
Six months ago, Jero Pudak used her portion of loan to purchase super quality feed and various seeds for her garden. The sow give birth to ten healthy piglets and she sold them all to repay the loan and set some aside for saving. Her husband works at the garden and also helps her to maintain the pigs. She’s very happy with the result. 

The Dewi Fortuna group succeeded in making their payment and will continue to borrow a loan. Now they will focus on farming. One member can’t attend the meeting because her daughter is sick, and one member decided to resign because he must move to town to work there. He was replaced by a new member.

Jero Pudak will use her loan to purchase various seeds, fertilizer, and farming tools. Other members are doing the same. They still purchase piglets and have the pig business, using their own saving. They hope both of the businesses run smoothly and they can earn a profit.

loans.use: to purchase various seeds, fertilizer, and farming tools

loans.name: Sanavbar

texts.ru: Санавбару 23 года. Она не замужем. Санавбар очень добрая, милая, активная и шустрая девушка. Она вместе с мамой и двумя братьями проживает на районе Душанбе. Санавбар увлеклась этой профессией еще 6 лет назад. Она научилась шить у своей кузины. Санавбар по сей день, благодарна ей, за бесценный опыт. Некоторые ее работы Вы можете посмотреть за на фотографией за ее спиной. Санавбар обратилась за кредитом, потому что хочет приобрести новые швейные принадлежности и улучшить условия работы. С улучшением условий ускорится процесс работы. Санавбару мало лет и у нее все впереди, но она уже выбрала свою профессию и активно старается развиваться в сфере свой деятельности. Она заранее выражает Вам благодарность.
texts.en: Sanavbar is 23 years old. She is not married. Sanavbar is a very kind, cute, active and smart young woman. She, her mother and two brothers live in Dushanbe. Sanavbar started this profession 6 years ago. She learned how to sew from her cousin and is, to this day, grateful to her for this priceless experience. You can see some of Sanavbar's work behind her on the photograph. Sanavbar requested this loan because she wants to purchase new sewing accessories and improve her working conditions. Her work process will get faster with the improved conditions. Sanavbar is young and has everything ahead of her, but she has already chosen her profession and actively tries to grow in her business. She is grateful to You in advance.

loans.use: to purchase sewing accessories in order to improve her working conditions

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Jocelyn works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending. 

Jocelyn is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other equipment for her fishing business.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and to continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

loans.name: Cheryl

texts.en:
Cheryl is 55 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Cheryl is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Cheryl has been in the pig fattening business for 20 years and earns additional income from sewing.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell at her fish stall.

Gemma has been in this business for four years. She earns additional income from raising pigs.

Gemma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell at her fish stall.

loans.name: Ana Dinora

texts.es:
Dinora, de 29 años de edad, está felizmente casada, su esposo es empleado de una gasolinera ubicada a 1 kilómetro de distancia de su comunidad, tiene dos niños, que asisten a la escuela.

Dinora, proviene de padres agricultores, en su juventud trabajó realizando oficios domésticos, hasta que conoció a su esposo, actualmente a parte de dedicarse al cuido del hogar, invierte su tiempo con un molino eléctrico que tiene en su casa, desde muy temprano se acercan los clientes para moler el maíz para hacer las tortillas.

El Préstamo solicitado es para comprar otro molino que funcione con combustible, pues donde viven es frecuente que se den apagones de luz y entonces su negocio no funciona y por tal razón, es que necesitan comprar dicho equipo y así suplir la demanda de los clientes.

Dinora, sueña con que su negocio siga prosperando, de tal manera que cada vez tenga más clientes; también sueña con ir mejorando su casa y que sus hijos se superen y desarrollen bien como personas trabajadoras.
texts.en:
Dinora, 29, is happily married. Her husband is an employee at a gas station, located 1 kilometer of distance from her community. She has 2 children who attend school.

Dinora comes from farmer parents. In her youth, she did housework, until she met her husband. Currently, she works at taking care of the home. She spends time with an electric mill that she has at home. Customers come early for grinding corn for making tortillas.

The loan she requests is to buy another mill that runs on fuel, because blackouts often occur where she lives, and then her business does not function. For that reason, they need to buy the equipment and supply the demand of the customers.

Dinora, dreams of keeping her business thriving, in such a way, that she will increasingly have more customers. She also dreams of improving her house, and that her children overcome, and develop well as working people.

loans.use: to buy another mill that runs on fuel.

loans.name: Gregorio Romeli

texts.es:
Gregorio, de 22 años de edad, estudió técnico en ventas con la cámara de comercio, actualmente está acompañado y su pareja es empleada en una joyería, en la casa también vive su hermana y sus dos hijos.

Gregorio, ha sido siempre muy trabajador, luego de haber obtenido su título tuvo 2 empleos, pero el trabajo era muy agotador, porque trabajaba más de 12  horas diarias y los tiempos de comida eran muy cortos; por esa razón decidió iniciar su propio negocio y renunció al trabajo.- Como su padre es comerciante de ganado, él está yendo a los centros de comercio de animales a comprar cerdos, ahí paga quien se los destace y vende su carne en el mercado, hasta el momento le está yendo bien con el negocio. 

El préstamo solicitado es para comprar ganado bovino, porque ya no solo quiere vender carne de cerdo, si no también de res, pues sus clientes en el mercado le están demandando este producto, pues saben que la vende a un buen precio y no quiere desaprovechar esa oportunidad.

Gregorio, sueña con llegar a tener su propia ganadería y un negocio fuerte de venta de carne de res y cerdo y si es posible de otro tipo de carne también; de esta manera gozaría de una mejor calidad de vida para él, su esposa y sus futuros hijos.
texts.en:
Gregorio is 22 years old and is married. He studied sales through the chamber of commerce, and he is wife works at a jewelry store. They live with her sister and her two children. 

Gregorio has always been a very hard worker, after obtaining his degree he had two jobs, but the work was very tiring for him because he worked more than twelve hours every day and had very short meal breaks. For this reason he decided to quit his job and launch his own business. Just like his father, Gregorio is a livestock salesman and goes to animal markets to purchase hogs, from there he pays for them to be butchered and then sells their meat in the market. This business has been going well.

The requested loan will be used to purchase cattle, because Gregorio doesn't want to sell just pork anymore, he also wants to sell beef. His clients in the market are asking for this product because they know he will sell it at a good price and Gregorio doesn't want to miss out on this opportunity. 

Gregorio hopes to own his own ranch one day and to have a strong business selling beef and pork and possibly other types of meat as well. This way he will achieve a better quality of life for himself and his wife and for their future children.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Penelope

texts.en:
Penelope is 36 years old. She has a partner and four children. She runs a small business selling tomatoes, beans and cabbage in her community and has been doing this for four years. 

Penelope has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed spray, a spade, a rake, bush knives, etc. She joined SPBD in 2010, to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Penelope hopes to extend her business and to save for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed spray, a spade, a rake, bush knives, etc.

loans.name: Masaga

texts.en:
Masaga is 20 years old. She runs a small business selling ice cakes and coconut drinks in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Masaga has requested a loan to buy a sack of sugar, plastic bags, a bag of ice, coolio and a container to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profits to expand her business in her community. Masaga became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a sack of sugar, plastic bags, a bag of ice, coolio and a container.

loans.name: Matalena

texts.en:
Matalena is 27 years old, and is a single woman with one child. She runs a small business selling pies and cookies in her community and has been doing this for two years. 

Matalena has requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, yeast, sugar, pans, peanuts, etc. She joined SPBD in 2014, to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Matalena hopes to expand her business and support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, yeast, sugar, pans, peanuts, etc.

loans.name: Jeanna

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Jeanna works hard to support her family.

She has a photocopy business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from a general store. Jeanna is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to buy an additional unit for her photocopier business.
 
Jeanna has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy an additional unit for her photocopier business.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, de 36 años de edad, está acompañado y su pareja es comerciante y tiene dos hijas que están estudiando.

Manuel, tiene una carpintería desde hace 3 años y lo aprendió por medio de su hermano, quien también es carpintero.- También se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras.

Manuel, necesita el crédito para comprar cepillo, taladro y madera para seguir trabajando en la carpintería, de esta manera mejorara su vida, ya que tendrá más ingresos para él y su familia. 

El sueña con que su carpintería crezca y que en un futuro la pueda mejorar y que genere más ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel, 36, is married and his partner is a merchant. They have two daughters who attend school.

Manuel has had a carpentry workshop for 3 years. He learned carpentry from his brother who is also a carpenter. He also sells fruits and vegetables.

Manuel needs a loan to buy wood, a drill, and a carpenter’s plane to keep working as a carpenter and improve his life because he will have more income for himself and his family. 

He dreams that his worship will grow and in the future will improve sales to generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase wood and tools to make furniture

loans.name: Sandra Maribel

texts.es:
Sandra, de 32 años de edad, está divorciada, tiene un hijo que vive con ella, el niño está estudiando. 

Sandra, vende ropa, desde hace 1 año, se dedica al comercio de ropa, lo aprendió por medio de su madre, quien le enseño acerca de este negocio, ella vende de manera ambulante en toda la comunidad.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar ropa y así mejorar su negocio, ya que tendrá más ingresos para ella y su familia. 

Sandra, desea que su negocio crezca a corto plazo y que llegue a ser sostenible para asegurarle mejores condiciones de vida a su hija.
texts.en:
Sandra, 32, is divorced. She has a child who lives with her and attends school. Sandra sells clothing, which she began one years ago. She sells clothes, which is a trade she learned from her mother who taught her about the business. She is a street vendor who sells throughout the community.

She needs a loan to buy more clothing to improve her business so she will have more income for herself and her family.
Sandra wants her business to grow in the short-term and to become sustainable to ensure a better life for her daughter.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to improve her business

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es:
Catarina es una mujer de 41 años de edad es casada, tiene una linda familia de 4 hijos de las edades entre 6 y 18 años de edad, viven en una comunidad de Sololá.
Catarina madre de familia, trabajadora  y responsable ella para generar sus ingresos se dedica a la producción y venta de banano, desde hace 20 años, ella eligió esta actividad porque le gusta convivir con la naturaleza, Catarina con el amor y amabilidad con  la que produce y vende sus bananos ha logrado mucha clientela, es por eso que ella necesita incrementar su producción para abastecer a las necesidades de la clientela, pero una de las dificultades que Catarina tiene es que no cuenta con un terreno suficiente donde pueda cultivar más bananos, por tal razón ella solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para comprar un terreno donde podrá cultivar más banano e incrementar su producción.
El gran anhelo de Catarina es  poder conseguir el préstamo para incrementar su producción de banano, y seguir ayudando a sus hijos en la escuela para que sean  buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Catarina is a 41 year-old woman who is married and has a beautiful family with 4 children between the ages of 6 and 18.  They live in a community in Solola.

Catarina is the mother of the family.  She is hardworking and responsible so that she can generate income from her activity growing and selling bananas.  She's been doing this work for 20 years.  She chose this line of work because she enjoys interacting with nature.  With the love and kindness with which she produces and sells her bananas, Catarina has managed to attract many customers.  This is why she needs to increase her production so that she can meet the needs of all of her customers.  However, one of the difficulties she faces is not having enough land to cultivate bananas.  This is why Catarina is requesting a loan to buy some land where she can grow more bananas and increase her production.

Catarina's greatest desire is to be able to get a loan to increase her banana production so that she can continue to help her children with their eduction so that they can become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy land to farm

loans.name: Hilda Timbire Group

texts.es:
HILDA, tiene 56 años de edad, vive con su esposo en su propia casa, donde tiene un pequeño restaurante. en su primer crédito ella compró una maquina para hacer pan, un horno y los materiales necesarios para la panadería. hoy en dia gracias a sus ganancias atiende junto a su esposo su restaurante, da trabajo a una señora y por temporada contrata a una persona mas para poder satisfacer las exigencias de sus clientes.
tiene aspiraciones de en un lapso de 5 años, adquirir una camioneta con sus ahorros que hasta el momento realiza.
Está muy agradecida por que ha podido comprar muchas cosas necesarias en el hogar. se siente contenta de poder trabajar conjuntamente con su esposo. forma parte de un grupo de banca comunal de 7 personas. en este crédito ella recibirá $ 1400 dolares como varios de su grupo.

sabe que con su negocio esta aportando a su comunidad ya que a mas de servir a turistas, también vende alimentos a personas de bajos recursos y ancianos  a bajo precio.
texts.en:
Hilda is 56 years old and lives with her husband in their home in which she operates a small restaurant. With her first loan, she bought a machine for making bread, an oven, and necessary ingredients for the bakery. Today, thanks to her earnings, she operates the business alongside her husband and employs a woman and seasonally hires one more person to meet the demands of her customers. Her goal for the next five years is to purchase a van with her savings from her income.

She is grateful that she was able to buy many necessary things in her home. She feels happy that she is able to work with her husband. She is part of a village banking group with 7 people. In this group loan, Hilda will receive $1,400 as a member of the group. She knows that her business is contributing to her community. In addition to serving food to many tourists, she also sells food to low-income people and the elderly at lower prices.

loans.use: to outfit her restaurant with plates, pots, utensils, chairs, and purchase ingredients for preparing food

loans.name: Joi

texts.en:
Joi is a minimum wage earner. She realized how difficult it is to survive being dependent on her meager salary. She made side earnings in a laundry service. She can easily introduce her laundry services into her office and their office clients. Now she wants to expand her business. 

She applied for a loan to purchase an additional laundry machine to increase income. 

She doubles her effort, as her children are growing older and require more financial support for their education. 

In the future, she hopes to acquire a bigger space for her business.

loans.use: to buy an additional laundry machine

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth has mastered her skills in sewing different styles of dresses. She has her own unique style for which she is known.  This has kept her business going for more than five years now. 

Recently Elizabeth requested a loan to buy a sewing machine. 

Elizabeth hopes to expand her business by displaying items in her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Calor Satipeño Group

texts.es:
Andrea de 32 años conviviente y tiene dos hijos. Hace dos años se dedica a la venta de  ropa de segunda de manera ambulatoria en un lugar céntrico.  Con estos ingresos apoya a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar y así darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. El mayor sueño de  Andrea es tener su propio local para su venta de ropa. El crédito lo invertirá en  la compra de más mercadería de ropa de segunda mano. Andrea es la que esta sentada con un niño a lado derecho de la foto
Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por confiar en ella.
texts.en: Andrea is 32 years old and is in a relationship. She has two children. Two years ago she started to sell used clothing itinerantly in a central location. With this income she helps her husband with the household expenses and thus provides a higher quality of living for her family. Her main dream is to have her own store to sell clothing. The loan will be invested in the purchase of more secondhand clothing. Andrea is seated with a child to the right of the photo. She thanks the Kiva lenders for their confidence in her.

loans.use: to buy second hand clothing merchandise.

loans.name: Juliana Liliana

texts.es: JULIANA LILIANA:  Es una mujer indígena que pertenece a la etnia miskita, es originaria de Puerto Cabezas; es alegre y luchadora, tiene 30 años de edad, madre soltera de tres hijos: Dos adolescentes que estudian su primaria y un pequeño de un año de edad. Desde hace 16 años se dedica a la venta de marisco de manera ambulante, generando sus ingresos propios con lo cual aporta económicamente en el hogar. Ante la dificultad de no tener garantías materiales, para acceder al crédito formó parte de un grupo solidario, por un periodo de 4 años, ahora que ha ido mejorando sus ingresos, ha ido adquiriendo bienes materiales como electrodomésticos que ya puede poner en garantía, por lo que se ha desligado del Grupo Solidario y está solicitando su primer crédito individual para comprar más pescados y camarones, para vender en los barrios de Bilwi. Sueña con llegar a tener una tienda de ropa nueva y calzado.
texts.en:
JULIANA LILIANA:  is an indigenous woman who belongs to the Miskito ethnic group. She is originally from Puerto Cabezas. She is happy and determined. She is 30 years old. She is a single mother of three children: two teens studying in primary school, and a little one year old. 

For 16 years, she has sold seafood on the street, generating her own income which contributes financially to the household. Given the difficulty of not having material guarantees, to gain access to the loan, she was part of communal bank, for a period of 4 years. 

Now that she has been improving her income, she has been acquiring material goods, such as appliances, that can be used as collateral. That is why she has separated from the communal bank, and is seeking her first individual loan, to buy more fish and shrimp, to sell in the neighborhoods of Bilwi. She dreams of having a store with new clothes and shoes.

loans.use: to buy more fish and shrimp.

loans.name: Manupopo

texts.en:
Manupopo is a 49-year-old mother with five children. She runs a small business cooking rice and curry and coconut drinks; she sells them in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Manupopo has requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, a box of curry, a box of chicken, a sack of rice, a bottle of vegetable oil, a gas stove, a sack of potatoes, a sack of onions, plastics bags, and a container to help her run the business. 

Manupopo will use her profit to build a small restaurant in the near future. She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a box of curry, a box of chicken, a sack of rice,  a bottle of vegetable oil, a gas stove, a sack of potatoes, a sack of onions, plastics bags, and a container

loans.name: Jaimerlita

texts.en:
Jaimerlita is 60 years old and married; she lives in Polanco, Dipolog. She is managing her rice farm to earn a living.  She also engaged in a hog raising business. Jaimerlita has mastered doing this type of activity for 25 years now. She joined Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative in April of 2009. She is hardworking, and has a strong determination to pursue her goals to sustain her needs, alleviating poverty. 

Jaimerlita requested a loan to purchase fertilizer to increase production on her rice farm, additional piglets, animal feed, and vitamins. 

This will greatly help her boosting her income. 

Someday she hopes to buy a parcel of rice land to expand her rice farm and venture into a rice retailing business. 

Jaimerlita hopes to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to increase production on her rice farm, additional piglets, animal feed and vitamins

loans.name: Josiline

texts.en:
Josiline is a 32-year-old married woman with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She has a restaurant as a side income activity that supplement the clothing business. She is a very hard working woman who loves her business and is determined to transform it into a modern boutique. In spite of this, Josiline complains of the ever-changing fashions and designs on the market.

She will use the loan to buy clothes for selling.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Juan De Jesus

texts.es:
Juan, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta  noveno grado, está casado y su esposa es ama de casa y tiene dos hijos, los cuales actualmente estudian.

Juan, trabaja en una empresa distribuidora de energía eléctrica y su trabajo es leer el consumo de energía eléctrica de los de contadores, se ha dedicado a este trabajo desde hace 5 años, se va caminando hasta su lugar de trabajo y su horario es de 9 horas diarias.    

Juan, necesita el crédito para comprar una motocicleta, esto le ayudara mucho para dirigirse más rápido a sus destinos y visitar más comunidades durante el día.

Juan, sueña con ayudar a sus hijos para que estudien y sean profesionales de éxito.
texts.en:
Juan is 35 years old and studied through the ninth grade. He is married and his wife is a homemaker. They have two children who are currently in school.

Juan works for an electricity distribution company. His job is to read the electricity usage meters. Juan has been at this job for five years. He walks to his place of employment and works a nine-hour schedule each day.

Juan needs a loan in order to buy a motorcycle. This will be a great help in getting him to his destinations faster and with visiting more communities throughout the day. His dream is to help his children with their studies so that they can become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for his job.

loans.name: Jose Eleazar

texts.es:
José, de 55 años de edad, estudio solamente primer grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen 6 hijos y solamente 2 viven con ellos y trabajan; además de sus hijos viven 2 nietas con ellos. 

José, es agricultor y aprendió desde muy pequeño ya que le ayudaba a sus padres a las labores del campo, en época de sembrar trabaja 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y camina 20 minutos para llegar hasta donde están sus cultivos, además compra ganado y luego los vende, cuando considera que le quedará ganancias. 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una vaca, con el fin de hacer que se reproduzca, espera en un futuro poderla vender a un buen precio, anteriormente se le otorgó un crédito, el cual lo utilizó para el mismo destino y le sacó provecho.  

El sueño de él es, seguir adelante en el trabajo del campo, para mantener a su familia y desea que le pueda ir bien en la cosecha que se avecina.
texts.en:
José is 55 years old and only studied up to Grade 1. He is in a relationship and his partner works doing domestic chores. They have 6 children but only two live with them and work. Besides their children two grandchildren live with them.

José is a farmer. He learned this very early as he helped his parents with the work in the fields. In the seeding season he works 7,000 square meters of corn and walks 20 minutes to get to where his crops are. He also buys and sells cattle then it considers that it will be profitable. He needs the loan to buy a cow, with the goal of making it pregnant, hoping in the future to sell it at a good price. He was awarded a loan before and he used it for the same purpose and it was a success. His dream is to continue with his work in the fields to support his family and he hopes things go well for him in the looming harvest.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Maria Gumercinda

texts.es:
Podría parecer fácil realizar lo que doña María hace para ganarse la vida, sin embargo, es un trabajo arduo que requiere esfuerzo. Ella desde hace 20 años se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas de maíz las cuales comercializa en su comunidad. 

Su trabajo le ha ayudado a salir adelante con su familia y vivir una vida modesta, pero, solicita un crédito para hacerle mejoras a su vivienda y para construir un inodoro, que le permita tener condiciones más sanas  de vida. Entre las  metas de esta humilde mujer esta seguir creciendo y luchando por una vida mejor.
texts.en:
It would seem easy to do what María does to earn a living.  However, it is arduous work that requires effort.  She has been making corn tortillas and selling them in her community for 20 years.  Her work has helped her to get ahead with her family and to live a modest life.

She is requesting a loan to makes improvements to her house and to build a bathroom.  This will allow her to have healthier living conditions.  Among the goals of this humble woman are to continue growing and struggling for a better life.

loans.use: to makes improvements to her house and to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Pascuala

texts.es:
Pascuala es una mujer de 55 años de edad,  esta simplemente juntado con su esposo  con el que tiene una familia de 2 hijos  una mujer y un hombre, viven en una comunidad de Sololá.
Pascuala  una madre de familia amable y perseverante que para generar  sus ingresos se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica en la plaza de su comunidad, esta actividad lo realiza ella desde hace 12 años, a ella le gusta el comercio es por eso que eligió esta  actividad, pero para mejorar sus ingresos ella vende frijoles en una plaza circunvecina de su comunidad.
Para ella es muy importante su negocio pues es de lo que ella vive con su familia, los trajes día con día se fabrican nuevos estilos y colores por lo que la gente lo busca muy constante, pero ella se ha dado cuenta que debe invertir más en su negocio para satisfacer las necesidades de la clientela, pero para poder realizar esta inversión ella ahora solicita un préstamo que lo utiliza para comprar más ropas típicas y luego venderlas a un buen precio.
El anhelo de Pascuala es  poder conseguir su crédito para que su negocio incremente, y así también mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Pascuala is a 55-year-old woman. She has a husband, with whom she had two children: a man and a woman. They live in the community of Sololá.

Pascuala is a kind and persevering mother who buys and sells traditional clothing in the plaza of her community in order to generate income. She has been doing this work for 12 years. She likes trade, which is why she chose this type of work, but in order to add to her earnings she sells beans in a plaza in a neighbouring community.

Her business is very important to her as she and her family live off the money she gets from it. The clothes are made every day in new styles and colours, which is why people always want them, but she has realised that she needs to invest more in her business in order to meet the needs of her clients. In order to be able to make this investment, she is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy more traditional clothing and then sell them later at a good price.

Pascuala’s wish is to be able to get a loan so that her business increases and so her income increases as well.

loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en: From Dipolog City, Maria Fe earns a living through her footwear sales. She seeks to have enough inventory to continuously provide for her family. For her capital needs, PMPC has stood by her since the start of her business. She is happy that she is able to survive the odds of business with determination and her family as her inspiration. To earn more, she applied for a loan to purchase more footwear inventory to sell. Maria Fe hopes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase more footwear inventory

location.town: Dipolog - Dicayas, Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Nor

loans.name: Yarima

texts.es: Yarima de 23 años de edad, es la propietaria de un taller de confecciones ubicado en un municipio área metropolitana de Barranquilla, donde habita con su cónyuge y su pequeño hijo de 2 años. Su madre enseño desde muy pequeña el arte de la confección a Yarima y por eso cuando estuvo lista para generar ingresos autónomos  decidió acudir a su experiencia y su aptitud para la costura, y esto hace dos cuando  empezó elaborando diversas prendas de vestir en todas las líneas para venderlas  y desde entonces no se ha detenido. En su taller Yarima realiza  todas las operaciones de la confección, tiene moldes que ella misma produce y prepara, ensambla y da el acabado preciso a la prenda, que después vende a una clientela que poco a poco ha captado, con su capacidad de servicio. Su trabajo lo realiza desde los lunes hasta los domingos en los horarios de 9 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche, comprando de contado a mayoristas y vendiendo a crédito, Su mayor sueño es proporcionarles a su  hijo una educación de calidad y esto es justamente el motor que la despierta día a día para trabajar fuertemente junto a su cónyuge. En la actualidad está aplicando a  un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará  insumos y materias primas como telas, hilos etc. Con esta inversión planea incrementar su producción para generar más ganancias, haciendo así de su credikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
Yarima is 23 years old, the owner of a clothing shop located in a municipality in the metropolitan area of Barranquilla, where she lives in free union with her partner and their two year old son. Yarima’s mother taught her the art of tailoring from a very young age, thus when she was ready to generate independent income, she decided to use her experience and aptitude in tailoring. Two years ago, she started designing various garments in all lines to sell and hasn't stopped since.

In her shop, Yarima performs all aspects of garment making. She has patterns she makes herself as well as prep, ensemble and finish off fabricating each garment, which she then sells to clients that her service capacity is capturing little by little. She works Monday to Sunday from 9 in the morning to 7 at night. She buys wholesale in cash and sells to her clients at credit. Her biggest dream is to provide a high-quality education for her son, which is exactly what pushes her to wake up and work hard every day, along with her life partner.

She is presently applying for a Credikiva loan, the first loan made to her by the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which she will use to buy supplies and raw materials such as fabric, threads, etc. With this investment, she plans to increase her production to generate more revenue and in this way, make her Credikiva loan a success.

loans.use: buy supplies and raw materials such as fabric, threads, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase various kinds of goods to sell

loans.name: Santos Pastor

texts.es:
Santos, de 55años de edad, no pudo estudiar ya que desde siempre se dedicó a la agricultura, a ayudarle a su padre, está acompañado y su pareja es ama de casa, tiene 5 hijos, pero todos están acompañados

Santos, es agricultor, tiene 30 años de dedicarse a la siembra de granos básicos,  esta labor la aprendió de su papá, esta es la única fuente de ingreso que tiene, el horario de trabajo es de 5 horas.

Santos, necesita el dinero para pagar el alquiler de un terreno donde sembrará sus granos básicos.

Los sueños de Santos son, poder obtener las ganancias suficientes para poder comprar su propio terreno  y seguir cosechando y teniendo ganando y darle la oportunidad a sus hijos de estudiar.
texts.en:
55-year-old Santos was not able to study since he has always been working in agriculture to help his father. He has a partner and she is a housewife. He has five children, but they all have partners.

Santos is a farmer. He has 30 years of experience in sowing basic grains. He learnt this work from his father. It is the only source of income that he has. He starts work at 5 a.m.

Santos needs the money in order to pay the rent on the piece of land where he will sow his basic grains.

Santos’ dreams are to be able to obtain enough profit to be able to buy his own piece of land and continue harvesting his crops and giving his children the opportunity to study.

loans.use: to pay for the rent on the piece of land where he will sow his basic grains

loans.name: Vecinos De Mareategui Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por  5 personas responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “VECINOS DE MAREATEGUI” una de ellas es la Sra. Isabel   de 40 años conviviente  y con 2 hijos, la Sra. Isabel  se dedica ya hace 3 años a la venta de ropa en un pequeño local  todos los días con el mérito de salir adelante y así poder pagar el colegio de sus hijos, Con el fruto de su esfuerzo la Sra. Isabel  ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar en la educación de sus hijos. Seguir mejorando su negocio, su mayor deseo es que sus hijos sean profesionales es por eso  que la Sra. Isabel   trabaja mucho , Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más mercadería de Ropa, Telas, etc  y así poder tener más ingresos. A la vez a la Sra. Isabel se encuentra sentada y se le distingue con una blusa color negro con blanco , se despide con un abraso a Kiva y Edaprospo y  agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en:
This group consists of five responsible individuals who engage in different business activities. They are the members of the Communal Bank “Vecinos de Mareategui” (Neighbors of Mareategui).

One of the members is Sra. Isabel. She is 40 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. For the past three years, she has been selling clothes every day from a small shop. With her profit, she is able to get ahead and also pay for her children’s schooling. As a result of the fruit of her labor, Sra. Isabel has been able to improve her home and support her children’s education. She wants to continue improving her business. Her greatest wish is to see her children become professionals. For this reason, Sra. Isabel works very hard. The loan she is receiving will be invested in more merchandise, such as clothing, fabrics, and other products so that she can earn more income.

In the photo, Sra. Isabel is seated and wearing a black and white blouse. She bids farewell to Kiva and EDAPROSPO with a hug and expresses her appreciation for the loan that has been issued to her. This makes it possible for her to make progress.

loans.use: to buy clothing, fabrics, and other products.

loans.name: Imakulata

texts.en:
Imakulata is a 25-year-old mother with one child. She owns and operates a small business of selling elei (fabric) printing materials at the market to earn a living. Imakulata has requested a loan to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brushes, elei design, containers and a printing machine to assist her in running the business. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Imakulata hopes to build a small elei shop in her village in the near future. She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brushes, elei designs for fabric, containers and a printing machine

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga is a 22-year-old mother with one child. She runs a small business of cooking rice and curry and selling it in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Olga has requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, a box of curry, a box of chicken, a sack of rice, a bottle of vegetable oil, a gas stove, a sack of potatoes, a sack of onions, plastics bags and a container to help her run the business. 

Olga will use her profit to build a small restaurant in the near future. She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a box of curry, a box of chicken, a sack of rice, a bottle of vegetable oil, a gas stove, a sack of potatoes, a sack of onions, plastics bags and a container

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie is 40 years old and has two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buying and selling of charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a 23,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Josie has borrowed and paid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the charcoal business for 10 years and also earns an income from rice retailing and food vending.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Jose Fausto

texts.es:
José, de 61 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de ir a una escuela, porque sus padres tenia pocos recursos económicos, está acompañado y su pareja es ama de casa, tiene 6 hijos, pero solo uno vive con ellos y trabaja en la agricultura.  

José, es empleado en una farmacia y su cargo es de vigilante desde hace 3 años, además cuando descansa haces trabajos de albañilería y compra y vende ganado; para ir a su trabajo lo hace en bus y su horario es por turnos.  

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar bloques, cemento, arena y hierro para hacer un muro alrededor de su casa.  

El sueño de José, es terminar de construir la casa y poco a poco hacerle ajustes, en un futuro quiere ponerle piso y seguir trabajando para solventar todos los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Jose, 61 years old, did not have the opportunity to attend school because his parents had few financial resources. He is in a relationship, his partner is a homemaker, and he has six children. One of the children lives with them and works in agriculture.

Jose has been employed for three years by a pharmacy as a security guard. Additionally, in his free time he does construction work, and he buys and sells livestock. His job has a shift schedule and he takes the bus to get to work.

He needs the loan to buy blocks, cement, sand and iron to build a wall around his house.

Jose's dream is to finish building the house, and little by little make some improvements. In the future he would like to put in a floor, and he wants to continue working so that he can cover the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy blocks, cement, sand and iron to build a wall around his house.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 52 years old and married with seven children.

Delia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Delia has borrowed and paid 21 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Delia aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 47 years old and married with three children.

Gemma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 29,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of snack foods, canned goods and other groceries.

Gemma has borrowed and paid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from fattening pigs.

Gemma aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of snack foods, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Arnold Ivan

texts.es:
Arnold, de 27 años de edad, es bachiller, tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad, vive con su pareja, una hermana y su mamá.

Arnold, tiene una barbería desde hace más de 7 años, este oficio se lo enseñó su tío, desde su casa se tarda 25 minutos en autobús para llegar hasta su lugar de trabajo y lo hace de lunes a sábado. 

El necesita el préstamo para comprar sillones, gaveteros y máquinas para la barbería, debido a la demanda de clientes que tiene quiere aire acondicionado, para ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

Arnold, sueña con tener otro local en un futuro y pretende contratar otra persona que le ayude, ya que él solo no da abasto con todo el trabajo y le toca trabajar hasta altas horas de la tarde.
texts.en:
Arnold is 27 years old and a high school graduate. He has a five-year-old son and lives with his partner, a sister, and his mother.

Arnold has a barber shop that he has managed for more than seven years. He learned this trade from his uncle. From his house, it takes him 25 minutes by bus to get to his place of work. He works Monday through Saturday.

Arnold needs a loan in order to buy chairs, work drawers, and equipment for his barber shop so that he can offer better service to his customers. He will also meet the demands of customers who want air conditioning.

Arnold dreams of having another shop in the future and intends to hire another person to help him. He is not equipped to handle all of the work alone, so this will prevent him from having to work late into the evening.
