texts.es: A sus  62 años de edad  Pastora tiene 9 hijos mayores de edad e independientes, Pastora se quedo viuda  y desde ahí vive sola, ella vive en el campo y se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de animales ya que comenta que en este lugar estas actividades son las fuentes de ingreso, Pastora necesita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de terneros y seguir adelante en su negocio, Pastora tiene la aspiración de seguir con su negocio, mejorarlo y asi tener los ingresos para sus necesidades y tener una vejez digna.
texts.en: At 62 years old, Pastora has 9 adult, independent children. Pastora became a widow and since then has lived alone. She lives in the countryside and works in agriculture and raising animals and says that in this place, this work is the source of income. Pastora needs the loan to invest in the purchase of calves and continue onward with her business. Pastora and the goal of continuing with her business, improving it, and in this way having the income for her needs and to have a decent old age.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Jherson De Jesus

texts.es:
Estudiar y trabajar siempre es un doble esfuerzo, pero cuando se trata de luchar por mejorar nuestra calidad de vida, vale la pena las noches en vela por los estudios. Jherson, es un ejemplo de esto, porque en la actualidad, él labora de día en una empresa de cómputo y de noche estudia Ingeniería en computación. Además, confiesa que  cuando uno ama lo que hace, el trabajo se convierte en un extra en el proceso de crecimiento profesional, que muchos no tienen. 
Jherson solicita un crédito para la compra de una computadora portátil, que le servirá como herramienta de trabajo en la universidad, pues en su carrera –más que otras- es imprescindible poseerlas, ya que debe instarle programas informáticos y es más cómodo usar una laptop. Este joven estudioso y perseverante espera graduarse en un par de años y continuar en su desarrollo profesional.
texts.en:
To study and work is always a double effort, but when it is about fighting to improve our quality of life, it is worth the late nights studying. Jherson is an example of this, because currently he works during the day at a computer business and at night studies computer engineering. In addition, he says that when one loves what one does, the work becomes an extra in the process of professional growth, which many don't have.

Jherson asks for a loan to purchase a laptop which will serve as a tool at university, since in his major - more than others - it is essential to have them, since he has to install computer programs and it is easier to use a laptop. This studious and determined young man hopes to graduate in a couple years and continue with his professional development.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop.

loans.name: Karimberdi

texts.ru: Каримберди пожилой мужчина в возрасте 50 лет. Он работает в фирме по строительству дорог. У него неплохой заработок, но все же на необходимые условия проживание недостаточно. Он был женат, но к сожалению этот брак долго не продлился и они развелись. Вот уже несколько лет он живет один, без семьи и детей. В данное время Каримберди хочет ещё раз женится, но для проведение свадебного мероприятия ему необходимо денежные средства. Поэтому Каримберди обратился в Арванд для получение кредита и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку и понимание!!!
texts.en: Karimberdi is a 50-year-old man who works for a company that builds road.  He makes a decent living which, however, is still not enough to afford all the necessities of life.  He used to be married but, unfortunately, his marriage did not last and he is now divorced.  He has been living alone for a few years now, without any family or children.  At the moment he would very much like to re-marry but he needs some money to pay for his own wedding ceremony.  For this reason, he has turned to Arvand to receive a loan, and he thanks them in advance for their support and understanding!!!

loans.use: to pay for his own wedding expenses.

loans.name: Almira

texts.en: Almira wants to plant onions and this is why she is requesting your financial help again. She is got about five dynyms of land and she rents five more from other villagers. On the land, she plants potatoes, onions, and red peppers, as well as wheat, but the last only for family use.

loans.use: to buy onion seeds

loans.name: Ekaterine

texts.en:
Ekaterine, who is a 37-year-old woman, lives in Kutaisi city. She has two children and a pensioner grandmother. She has been unable to find a stable job, as she only has a secondary education and no work experience. In order to meet her family's increased needs, Ekaterine started a small trading business with silver jewelry. She purchases a quantity of jewelry and sells it in her community for a profit. To make more profit and purchase her products at lower prices, Ekaterine wants to go to Turkey, where there is a worldwide market. She will also expand the variety of jewelry she has, which will meet all her costumers' needs. 

Ekaterine has requested a loan at local financial institutions, but has been rejected several times due to her family's unstable financial condition. She has a really insignificant income and her family lives in poverty. Her loan request was approved under the framework of a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. This start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with reasonable conditions for the country's poor people, who do not have access to traditional credit products because they are regarded as “high risk borrowers."  Ekaterine and her family members will be very grateful for the help, as the living condition of the family will significantly increase and she will continue running her lovely business.

loans.use: To expand her trading business and make more profit

loans.name: Luis Lorgio

texts.es: A sus 54 años de edad Luis es un señor  muy trabajador que ha crecido en el campo y se dedica  a sembrar algún producto y a la crianza de animales Luis tiene 2 hijos y 2 hijas que ya son mayores de edad y ya trabajan de igual manera en el jornal de trabajos en el campo, Luis necesita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de terneros, ya que comenta que este es un buen negocio para el porque los terneros los cria pequeños y cuando están grandes los comercializa con ganancia, Luis tiene la aspiración de seguir trabajando y si es posible apoyar a sus hijos para mejorar la calidad de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en: At 54 years old, Luis is a very hard-working gentleman who has grown up in the countryside and works planting some crops and raising animals. Luis has 2 sons and 2 daughters who are now adults and who work similarly in the daily work of the countryside. Luis needs the loan to invest in the purchase of calves and says that this is a good business because he raises the calves from when they are small, and when they are big he sells them with earnings. Luis has the aspiration to continue working and, if it is possible, to support his children to improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Alla Ti Sinogo Group

texts.fr: Bintou, membre représentatif est mariée, mère de 5 enfants. Sa première fille est mariée et travaille comme institutrice, les autres enfants sont encore à l'école. Bintou est gérante d'un kiosque et cela fait 8 ans. Dans son kiosque, elle fait du café, du thé, du sandwich et prépare un peu de repas aussi pour vendre. Bintou a besoin de ce crédit pour renforcer son kiosque. Le groupe de Bintou a un bon parcours à ACFIME. Il est à son 8ème contrat de prêt mais jusque là, les remboursements se font bien. Bintou  a un employé qui l'aide dans son travail. A la fin du prêt, Bintou aura un bénéfice qui lui permettra d'aider son époux dans la gestion quotidienne de leur maison et de continuer son activité.
texts.en:
Bintou, our representative member, is married and a mother of five. Her eldest daughter is married and works as a school teacher; the other children are still in school.

Bintou has managed a kiosk for the past eight years. In her kiosk, she offers coffee, tea, and sandwiches; she also prepares some meals to retail. Bintou needs this loan to bolster her kiosk. Her group has a good history with ACFIME. This is their eighth loan; so far, there has been no issues with the repayments. Bintou has an employee helping her with her work.

At the end of the loan, Bintou will make a profit that will allow her to help her husband with their household’s daily expenses and to sustain her business.

loans.use: to buy tea, coffee, sugar, and bread to retail in her coffee kiosk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers and to pay rent on the land.

loans.name: Ivan Willan

texts.es:
Ivan tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su familia en el distrito de La Florida, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de San Miguel, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales principalmente.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, tiene más de 2 años de experiencia en el negocio y cuenta con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de más cerdos así como para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento del lugar donde los cría, dicha inversión le servirá para mejorar su negocio y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le generará mayores ingresos que le van a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ivan is 27 years old, single, and lives with his family in the La Florida district, in a rural zone that is located in the province of San Miguel, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in the community is peaceful and the population works in agriculture and raising animals, primarily. 

He works raising and selling pigs, he has more than 2 years of experience in the business and has steady customers who offer very good personal and work references for him. The loan will be used to purchase more pigs and to do repairs and maintenance on the place where he raises them. This investment will serve to improve his business and also to be able to meet the diverse needs of the customers in the zone which will generate more income for him that will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs and to do repairs and maintenance on the place where he raises them.

loans.name: Hamziya

texts.ru: Хамзия 46 летняя жительница района Дж.Руми. Она замужем. Но ее муж вместе с сыном находиться в Российской Федерации на заработках. Хамзия живет и работает на Родине вместе с дочерью. Хамзия работает воспитательницей в детском саду. Она обожает свою работу. Хамзия получает большое удовольствие работая с детьми, и она считает, что ей очень повезло иметь такую работу. Хамзия в свободное от работы время проводить за швейной машинкой. Она любит шить и научила свою дочь этому ремеслу. Дочь Хамзии довольно быстро учится и хочет заниматься этой деятельностью на профессиональном уровне. Хамзия полностью поддерживает ее в ее выборе. Хамзия могла бы подарить свою машинку, но так как ее дочь будет принимать заказы, ей нужна быстрая и профессиональная машинка. Хамзия поддерживает свою дочь и хочет, чтобы она начала свою деятельность, зарабатывала и стала финансово устойчивым человеком.
texts.en: Hamziya is 46 years old and she lives in the Rumy district of Tajikistan.  She is married.  Her husband and her son are currently working as migrant workers in the Russian Federation.  Hamziya lives and works in her homeland, with her daughter.  Hamziya works as a preschool teacher and loves her job.  For her, working with children is a real pleasure and she considers herself very lucky to have such a job.  When she is not working, Hamziya spends her time at her sewing machine.  She loves sewing and she has been teaching this activity to her daughter as well.  Her daughter is learning very fast, and would like to become a professional seamstress.  Hamziya fully supports her with this decision.  Hamziya could give her own sewing machine to her daughter but, since her daughter will be taking orders from her customers, she needs a professional sewing machine that will allow her to work very fast.  Hamziya is supporting her daughter and wants to see her start her own business, so that she can make a living and start being financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her daughter, so that she can start her own business.

loans.name: Abdunasar

texts.ru: Абдуназар добрый и жизнерадостный мужчина ему 43  лет. Он женат и отец двоих детей. Они живут всей семей в деревне. Абдуназар вот уже на протяжение 20 лет занимается животноводством. Он разбирается в этом деле и имеет большой опыт. В данное время он хочет  купить скот и увеличит количество скота, чтобы имеет хороший доход для нормального проживания. Но для этого ему необходимо денежные средства для покупки несколько голов скота. Так как он разбирается в этом деле он уверенно обратился в Арванд для получение кредита и благодарит Арванд за поддержку!!!
texts.en: Abdunasar is a kind 43-year-old-man with a positive attitude.  He is married and the father of two children.  The family lives in the countryside.  Abdunasar has been involved in animal husbandry for the past 20 years.  He knows his job very well and has acquired a great deal of experience.  At the moment, he wants to buy some livestock and increase his cattle headcount, so that he can have a good income and a decent life.  But in order to buy a few more head of livestock, he needs money.  Since he knows his business so well, he has turned to Arvand with confidence, in the hope of receiving a loan.  He thanks them in advance for their support!!!

loans.use: to buy a few head of livestock.

loans.name: Diana Maricela

texts.es: A sus 28 años de edad Diana esta casada,  ella tiene una hija de 9 años de edad y esta estudiando, el esposo de Diana trabaja de conserje en una escuela de su localidad, Diana tiene 3 años su negocio que es una tienda de abarrotes, confites, pan y demás, Diana va a invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de mercadería para su tienda, la aspiración de Diana es de seguir  trabajando en su tienda y de las ganancias que le quede seguir incrementando mas mercaderia y también pagar los estudios de su hija y los suyos ya que Diana esta estudiando a distancia, y de este modo a futuro quiere mejorar la calidad de vida de su hija.
texts.en:
At 28 years old, Diana is married, she has a daughter of 9 years old who goes to school. Diana's husband works as a caretaker at a local school.

Diana has been in business for 3 years, she has a store selling groceries, confectionery, bread, etc. Diana will use the loan money to stock the store. 

Diana's aspirations are to continue working in her store and from the earnings which remain continue increasing her stock and also pay for her daughter's education as well as her own, as Diana is doing distance-learning, and thus in the future improve her daughter's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy products for her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and foliar spray to protect her coffee crops.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is 44 years old and a married woman with nine children. Three of her children are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Margie has a making and selling of brooms business in the Philippines. Margie requested a 12,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional raw materials for her broom-making business.

Margie has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Margie would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her broom-making business.

loans.name: Matalena

texts.en:
Matalena is 37 years old and married with five children. She has a small garden where she grows tomatoes, cucumbers and cabbages that she can sell in her community or at the market to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Matalena needs a loan to buy rakes, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, seeds, etc.
 
She has been a member of SBPD since 2014. Matalena will use the profits from her sales to pay for her children's school fees and support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy rakes, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Elenita

texts.en:
Elenita is a 47 years old, married, and has 5 children.   Shes been is a banana farming for 5 years.  This is a good business for her and it allow her to provide for her family.    

She joined GDMPC last 2006, 

Recently, she decided to take another loan in the amount of  16,000 PHP to buy organic fertilizer for her banana farming business. 

In the future, she plans to use her business income to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for banana farming

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 26 years old and a married woman with one child in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Mercy has a general store business in the Philippines. Mercy requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items like shampoo, rice, toys, school supplies and other groceries.

Mercy has been in this business for three years. In the future, Mercy would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like shampoo, rice, toys, school supplies and other groceries.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is 28 years old, married, and the mother of  two children, which are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Maricel has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  Maricel has been in this business for 3 years. 

Maricel requested a 12,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell in her fish stall.

In the future, Maricel would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Albina

texts.en:
Albina is 59 years old, married, and has six children. 

Albina is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. 

Albina has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Albina requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines for her pigs.

In the future, Albina would like to save enough money in order to provide financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Ursecina

texts.en:
Ursecina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a direct selling avon products business in the Philippines. 

Ursecina has been in this business for 3 years. Ursecina earns additional income from running a general store.

She is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more products from avon to sell to her customers.

Ursecina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more products from avon to sell to her customers

loans.name: Chhieng

texts.en:
A woman living in Battambang province, Chhieng is 53 years old. 

Nowadays, she earns income to support her family by rice cropping on six hectares area. 

This is her seventh cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans. 

She will spend her entire loan portion on fertilizer for her rice farm. 

She hopes that she can earn enough income to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for rice cropping

location.town: Banteay Meanchey province, Ma Lay district

loans.name: Famille Victor Group

texts.fr: Né dans un champ de café, Victor en a pris du goût vues toutes les réalisations que cette culture a apporté dans sa famille. Malgré ses bienfaits,le problème se pose souvent quand il y a une urgence à régler et que la famille est obligée de vendre à la hâte son café afin de décanter certaines situations. Il projette avec son épouse d'acquérir un nouveau champ où ils repiqueront de plantules de café mais pour l'instant ce crédit servira à payer la main d'oeuvre pour entretien et récolte de champs dont les cerises sont déjà en croissance.
texts.en:
Born in a coffee field, Victor learned to like it given all that this culture has done for his family. Despite its benefits, problems often arise when an emergency comes up and the family is forced to retail their coffee as fast as possible to solve certain situations.

With his wife, he plans to buy a new field where they will graft small coffee plants, but for now this loan will be used to pay the workers who help him maintain and harvest the field in which the coffee berries are already growing.

loans.use: to pay workers to maintain and harvest his field.

loans.name: Arnold

texts.en:
Arnold is a 51-year-old father who raises his family in a rural community. Aside from being a farmer, he also operates his motorcycle transport to generate additional income. Despite the hardship of living, he has the determination to uplift the living status of his family. 

To continuously operate his motorcycle, he needs to take a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy wheels and spare parts needed for the maintenance of his motorcycle. Being a patient and  industrious father, he hopes and believes that someday, he will make his dream into a reality.

loans.use: to buy wheels and spare parts needed for his motorcycle

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan offers candies, pepper, peanuts, and juice drinks within her locality and other nearby municipalities. She and her husband have been engaged in this kind of business for 22 years. The couple work together hand in hand in order to get ahead in life.

She would like to borrow additional capital of PHP 25,000, allowing her to buy more stocks of candies, seasonings, four sacks of raw peanuts, and three kilograms of pepper to sell. She believes that her rolling store business can be maintained and profitable. Susan would be thankful enough if her requested loan were approved.

loans.use: to buy stocks of candies, seasonings, four sacks of raw peanuts, and three kilograms of pepper to sell

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is 42 years old, married, and has four children. They are currently living in a rural community, and Julius makes their living through farming. 

Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, Julius operates his motorcycle transport to earn additional income. He aims to continue this business, but he has limited capital. For this reason, he would like to access a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy spare parts and accessories needed for the maintenance of his motorcycle. 

He believes that this financial assistance will enable him to improve his business as well as his family's living condition.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and accessories needed for the maintenance of his motorcycle

loans.name: Isidra

texts.en:
Isidra is 60 years old, married, and has four children, one of whom is in school.

Isidra is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

She has been raising pigs for four years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Isidra would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 30 years old and married with three children.

Gina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell such as shampoo, coffee, chocolate drinks, cereals, detergent soap, canned goods, etc.

Gina has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from food vending.

Gina aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell such as shampoo, coffee, chocolate drinks, cereals, detergent soap, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is 50 years old and single.

She has a hog-raising business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Antonieta is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Antonieta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF, and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Maricel requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients, such as meat, spices, seasonings, etc., for her food production business.

Maricel has been in this business for one year now.

In the future, Maricel would like to save money to expand her business

loans.use: to buy ingredients, such as meat, spices, seasonings, etc., for her food production business.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a sixty-year-old, hardworking, married Ugandan man, living in Kamwenge. He deals in the rearing of livestock and also practices farming to earn an extra income. 

He started this project to educate his children. He wishes to expand his business and become a prominent man but faces a challenge of inadequate capital.

He is requesting a loan to buy more cows to add to his farm.

loans.use: to buy more cows to add to his farm.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny is 36 years old and married.  She works hard to provide for her family. 

She has been running a general store in the Philippines for 4 years, and also earns additional income from pre-paid mobile load and food vending.

Jenny is requesting a 22,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more inventory to sell like soap, detergent, canned goods, noodles, etc.

Jenny has borrowed and paid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell like soap, detergent, canned goods, noodles, etc

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 35 years old, married, and has two children who are both in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Betty has a general store business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for two years.

Betty requested a 12,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more snack foods, rice, feed, and other grocery items.

In the future, Betty would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more snack foods, rice, feed, and other grocery items

loans.name: Panfila

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Panfila works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from direct selling personal products. 

Panfila is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional containers of purified drinking water to sell.

Panfila has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. 

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional containers of purified drinking water to sell

loans.name: La

texts.en:
Living in a rural area in Battambang province, La is 45 years old and the mother of two school-children.

To earn income to provide for her family,  she grows rice.  She has been involved in this business for years and earns a decent income. 

This is her sixth cycle for La with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans successfully. 

She will spend her loan on fertilizer to support her farm. 

She hopes that she can get a bigger yield of rice than last year.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farm

loans.name: Sandra

texts.pt:
A Sra Sandra, de 41 anos de idade, solteira e mae de cinco filhos dos quais três estão na sua responsabilidade e os dois estão com sua avo.
É comeciante informal numa das esquinas da Cidade. Vende diversos artigos de roupa usada e calçado. Com o empréstimo pretende reforçar o mesmo negócio comprando mais fardo de roupa usada.  Apesar de enfrentar série dificuldades financeiras, o seu sonho é comprar uma viatura para a facilitar nas deslocaçoes, pois, o seu trabalho as vezes obriga que ela ande a fazer entrega porta-a- porta e, o seu desafio é reembolsar o crédito.
texts.en:
Sandra is 41 years old and single. She has five children, three of whom are under her responsibility and two live with their grandmother.
She's an informal vendor on one of the town's street corners. She sells various used garments and footwear. With the loan she intends to stock her business by purchasing more bundles of used clothing. Although she faces a great deal of financial difficulties, her dream is to buy a vehicle. This will make it easier for her to get around, since her work requires her to make door-to-door deliveries on foot. Her challenge is repaying the loan.

loans.use: to purchase more bundles of used clothing for re-selling.

loans.name: Jeronimo

texts.pt:
O Sr Jerónimo, de 30 anos de idade, casado e pai de dois filhos que não tem idade escolar. Para além dos seus dois filhos, sustenta ainda dois sobrinhos que frequentam o ensino primário e a sua mae.
É pedreiro de profissão e comerciante informal, isto é, tem uma cervejaria e pretende comprar mesa de bilhares para montar na sua cervejaria e como forma de aumentar a sua fonte de rendimento.  
Ele sonha em ser empreteiro das obras, ter todo o equipamento necessário para abertura de uma empresa. Tem o desafio de reembolsar o emprestimo dentro do prazo acordado.
texts.en:
Jerónimo is 30 years old and married. He has two children who are below school age. Aside from his two children, he also supports his mother and two nephews who attend primary school.
He's a bricklayer by trade and also an informal trader, that is to say, he owns a pub. He intends to purchase a pool table that he'll set up in his pub as a way of increasing his profits.
He dreams of being a building contractor and owning all of the equipment he needs to start a company. He faces the challenge or repaying the loan within the agreed-upon deadline.

loans.use: to purchase a pool table for his pub.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.en:
Gerardo is 22 years old. He lives with his grandparents. He does sewing and he is the owner of two sewing machines. 

He needs a loan to buy a new sewing machine. He has been lucky and his business is better so he wants to take a big step to improve his business. He hopes you can help him. Gerardo is still single and he is saving all the money he can because he is taking care of his grandparents

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread for his clothing business.

loans.name: Virginia Maria

texts.es:
Virginia es una mujer de 26 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hijo varón de 6 meses y 2 hijas mujeres de 6 y 4 años, y su negocio es la artesanía en confección de enaguas.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, amable, generosa, comprensiva, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘San Martín’  un área recientemente poblada, calles de tierra y vientos helados son el diario vivir, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura ambiente que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Virginia es de piel morena, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, ojos obscuros, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), y su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica a la construcción y con sus hijos; la hija mayor estudia en la escuela los 2 menores aún no se encuentran en edad escolar, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua potable y energía eléctrica, no tiene alcantarillado. Su negocio es el arte de la confección de enaguas, que es una falda delgada y suave usada como ropa interior, sobre ropa interior íntima, se suele usar bajo la pollera para ayudarle a colgar suavemente y prevenir la irritación de la piel de las telas. Este oficio que se realiza a mano y lo utilizan las mujeres de vestir tradicional. “inicie mi negocio trabajando para mi tía, luego me independicé y ahora trabajo sola y en mi domicilio…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que puede cuidar a sus hijos mientras costura, la desventaja es que sus clientas cada vez usan más vestidos que polleras, esto reduce a su público. Su sueño es abrir una tienda de enaguas y polleras, ella desea realizar la compra de tela por mayor y refaccionar un cuarto de su casa para habilitarla como taller de costura. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Virginia solicita un préstamo para la compra de tela por mayor y la refacción de un cuarto para habilitarlo como taller de costura, para abrir una tienda de polleras.
texts.en:
Virginia is a woman of 26 years old, she lives with her partner, she has a son of 6 months and two daughters of 6 and 4 years old, her business is making skirts. 

She is a good mother, enterprising, kind, generous, understanding, responsible and hardworking. Her business is located in the San Martin district, a recently inhabited area, dirt roads and icy winds are daily life in this cold, dry climate with an ambient temperature varying during the day from 0-12 degrees centigrade.

Virginia has a dark complexion, long black hair in braids, dark eyes, short stature, a strong build, she dresses in the traditional way (hat, shawl, pollera skirt). Her mother tongue is Aymara which she speaks at home and she speaks Spanish for everyday use and for business. She spends her life with her partner who works in construction and their children. Her eldest daughter goes to school but the two younger ones aren't old enough to go to school yet. They live in their own brick and cement home with an iron roof which has drinkable water and electricity but isn't connected to the sewerage system.

Her business is sewing enaguas, which are thin, soft skirts used as innerwear - over the underwear but under pollera skirts to help them hang smoothly and prevent the fabric irritating the skin. This work is done by hand and they are worn by women who wear traditional clothing.

"I started my business working for my aunt, then I went independent and how I work alone from home," she says. 

The advantage of her business is that she can take care of her children while she sews, the disadvantage is that her customers are wearing more dresses than pollera skirts, which reduces her customers. Her dream is to open a store selling enagua underskirts and pollera skirts, she wants to purchase fabric wholesale and convert a room of her home to use it as a dressmaking workroom. This is her 1st loan cycle with the institution in 5 years that she has been in this line of work independently

These are the reasons that Virginia is requesting a loan to buy fabric wholesale and convert a room into a dressmaking workroom, to open a pollera store.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale and convert a room into a sewing workroom.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is married and has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 5 years.  

Lilia works hard to support her family. 

Lilia requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

In the future, Lilia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 50 years old, married, and has five children. Elizabeth works very hard to provide for them.

Elizabeth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more grocery items to sell in her general store.

Elizabeth has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items such as coffee, eggs, sugar, soft-drinks, noodles, etc. 

Elizabeth would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Mary  Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is married and works hard to support her family.  

Mary Ann has a welding shop business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 5 years now.  

She requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase plain sheets, steel bars, welding rods, etc.

In the future, Mary Ann would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase plain sheets, steel bars, welding rods, etc

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is widowed and has a buy-and-sell dry goods business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 12 years and she works hard to support her family. 

Juanita has successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a loan to further build her business. She is requesting 15,000 Philippine pesos through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to buy more stock of dry goods to sell, such as sandals, blouses and shorts.

In the future, Juanita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dry goods to sell, such as sandals, blouses and shorts.

loans.name: Percie

texts.en:
Percie is married and has six children, two of whom are in school. Percie works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like eggs, canned goods, soap, shampoo, spices, etc.

Percie has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Percie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like eggs, canned goods, soap, shampoo, spices, etc

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen, who is a forty-seven-year-old, hardworking, married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda,  used his previous loan to buy more cattle to raise. He still raises cattle and sells milk as his main source of income, a business he started in order to improve his standard of living. 

He also earns extra income from being an LC III chairman and farming. Stephen still hopes to become a very prominent businessman in the future, though he faces challenges from animal diseases and price fluctuations.

He is requesting a loan to buy more cattle for his farm.

loans.use: to buy more cattle for his farm.

loans.name: Mane

texts.en:
The nice woman in the photo is Mane, from Kndzoresk village. She lives with her elderly retired father-in-law, husband, and two little kids. Mane, despite her young age, is already skilled in farming activities. 

On the farm, Mane and her husband keep 17 heifers, 12 cows, 70 sheep and a pig, and her husband works very hard because the farm is the only constant income that allows their family to cover their minimum needs. 

Mane has applied for this loan to purchase 40 sheep and enlarge her livestock.  This is her second loan. She faced some difficulties in repaying her first loan from a local financial institution, and unfortunately wasn't able to pay it back. 

However, thanks to hard work during recent times, Mane was able to run her agribusiness in a sustainable way, ensuring that she will be able to cover the monthly payments. So, she has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second-chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for 40 sheep

loans.name: Asha

texts.en:
Asha is a married woman and has been blessed with three kids who attend school. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

Asha operates a poultry selling business, which has been operational for over four years. She mentioned disease outbreak causing losses as a challenge in the business. Asha dreams of becoming a wholesaler of poultry in the future. 

With the KES 50,000, she wants to purchase chicks and poultry feeds. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and poultry feeds

loans.name: Samphors

texts.en:
Samphors, 29, lives with family members in a rural village of the Battambang province. 

She is a mother of two children, one is in school and other one is too young. 

She earns income to support her family via rice cropping. 

This is her sixth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans. 

She will spend her loan to purchase fertilizer and rice seeds. 

She hopes that she can earn more income to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and rice seeds

loans.name: Sophea

texts.en:
Sophea is 35 years old and the mother of one school aged child.  She lives in Battambang province. 

To support her family, she grows rice as the main source of income. She has been involved in this business for years and earns about 35,700 KHR per day. 

This is Sophea's fifth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans. 

She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer to support her rice farm. 

She hopes that she can earn enough income to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to support her rice farm

loans.name: Abubacar

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Mussuri Província de Nampula tem 25 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É proprietário de uma alfaiataria no mercado Central local a mais de 6 anos onde ganha um rendimento que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com valor solicitado pretende adquirir um jogo sofá para sua casa. Este é o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende abrir uma mercearia e ampliar o seu negócio de alfaiataria. O seu maior desafio é dar continuidade com os seus estudos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Abubacar comes from Mussuri, province of Nampula. He's 25 years old and married with two underage children. He's not responsible for anyone else.
He has owned a tailor's shop at the local central market for over six years. He earns a profit which he uses for household expenses. With the requested amount he intends to purchase a sofa set for his home. This is his first loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to open a grocery store and expand his tailoring business. His biggest challenge is to continue his studies all the way to a college degree.

loans.use: to purchase a sofa set for his home.

loans.name: Suzana

texts.pt:
Nasceu  na  Província de Inhambane tem 28 anos de idade, vive maritalmente mãe de 1 filha menor de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua sobrinha.
Docente N1 a mais de 5 anos, aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende legalizar a matrícula da sua viatura. Este é o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende abrir uma mercearia e um mini condomínio para aluguer e um estaleiro de venda de material de construção
texts.en:
Suzana comes from the province of Inhambane. She's 28 years old and married. She has an underage daughter and is responsible for her niece.
She has been a teacher for over five years and earns an income that she uses for household expenses. With the requested amount she intends to pay for her vehicle's registration. This is her first loan with Hluvuku.
In the future she intends to open a grocery store and a mini condo for renting out, as well as a yard for selling construcion supplies.

loans.use: to pay for her vehicle's registration.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheet metal and wood to change the roof of the walkway of her home.

loans.name: Teodura

texts.en:
At the age of 66, Teodura works in a rice farm. 

She's been in rice production for 10 years, and it has been a successful business for her.  She earns enough profits from it to sustain the needs of her children. 

Teodura decided to take a loan in the amount of 6,000 PHP to buy organic fertilizer for her rice field. 

In the future, she plans to save money from her business profits.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for her rice field

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia is a 43-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol.  She has four children. Her oldest child is 21 and the youngest is 9. 

Antonia  runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells merchandise ranging from noodles, biscuits, cooking oil, canned goods, condiments, and toiletries.  In addition, she also operates a tricycle transportation services. 

She is asking for a loan to buy an assortment of inventory like soft drinks, noodles, canned goods, and fertilizers. These will help ensure that her store will be full of stock, thus catering to the needs of her customers. 

This will improve her sales and enable her to increase her finances. She will also be able to provide healthy meals for her whole family. 

Antonia is determined to expand her business to make it successful and improve the welfare of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of grocery items like soft drinks, noodles, canned goods, and fertilizers

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz tiene 34 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive junto a su cónyuge e hijos en el distrito de La Matanza que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en el distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de condimentos como pimienta, sal, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 04 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de condimentos para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Luz espera ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos que mejorarán su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz is 34 years old, and she is married. She lives with her husband and children in the district of La Matanza, which is located in the province of Morropón, in the region of Piura on the northern coast of Perú. Life in this district is peaceful, and the people make a living in agriculture, ranching, and raising animals.

Luz makes a living selling condiments such as pepper and salt, among other things. She has been doing this work for more than 4 years, so she has experience in this business as well as long-term customers who recommend her personally and professionally. The loan will be used to buy a greater supply of condiments and expand the inventory of her business. With this, Luz hopes to offer a wider variety of products to her customers, which will enable her to earn more income and improve the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater supply of condiments and expand the inventory of her business.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia runs a sari-sari (variety) store business. She sells commodities ranging from biscuits, eggs, powdered milk, seasonings, sugar and beverages to toiletries and other goods.  

She is a 36-year-old single woman and a resident in the town of Talibon, Bohol. In addition to that, she is also into the buying and selling of fresh fish.  

She is asking for a loan to buy various stock like milk, soap, sugar, soft drinks, rice and materials like styrofoam ( for fish storage). These items will fill her store with a variety of merchandise. This will cause her to attract more buyers and improve her earnings. She will be able to balance her finances and start to pay her obligations.

In the future, Alicia dreams to expand her business to make it productive and sustainable for the improvement of her livelihood.

loans.use: to buy various stock like milk, soap, sugar, soft drinks and rice, and materials like styrofoam (for fish storage).

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  

Norma has been in this business for 40 years, and works hard to support her family.  

Norma requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall.

In the future, Norma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Rocelyn

texts.en:
Rocelyn is 57 years old and married.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Rocelyn has been farming rice for 3 years and also earns additional income from farming vegetables.

Rocelyn is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy a variety of rice seeds and to pay the salaries of the laborers for land preparation.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of rice seeds and to pay the salaries of the laborers for land preparation

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 44 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell in her general store.

Rosita has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as rice, feeds, eggs, diapers, canned goods, soft drinks, etc. 

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto es un padre de familia de 49 años de edad es casado, tiene una hermosa familia de 4 hijos de las edades entre 10 y 14 años de edad, viven en una comunidad de Sololá.
Alberto para que a su familia no le haga falta nada se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica desde hace 15 años en una plaza de su comunidad, pero él cuenta que con este pequeño negocio no logra mantener a su familia es por eso que también trabaja como guardia en su colonia.
Con el paso del tiempo las ropas típicas han ido modernizado por lo que él ahora se ve a la necesidad de invertir más en su negocio comprando ropas típicas de distintos estilos y colores para abastecer las necesidades de la clientela, pero Alberto en este tiempo no cuenta con un capital suficiente, por tal razón él solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara comprando ropas típicas y luego venderlas a un buen precio.
El gran deseo de Alberto que sus hijos se gradúen de la escuela y construir una casa para ellos
texts.en:
Alberto is the father of a family, 49 years old, married, he has a beautiful family of 4 children from 10 to 14 years old. They live in a community in Solola.

Alberto has ensured that his family lacks for nothing by working buying and selling traditional clothing for 15 years in the town square, but this small business is unable to provide for his family so he also works as a guard in his neighborhood.

Over time, traditional clothing has modernized so now he sees the need to invest more in his business, buying traditional clothing in a variety of styles and colors to meet the needs of his customers, but at this time Alberto doesn't have enough capital, so he his requesting a loan which will be used to buy traditional clothing which he will later sell at a good price.

Alberto's biggest wish is that his children will graduate from school and to build a house for them.

loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing.

loans.name: Narciso

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 30 anos de idade, solteiro pai de 1 filho menor de idade, responsabiliza-se pelos seus pais.
É trabalhador na empresa de água mais de 8 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como blocos e cimento. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende abrir uma mercearia e um salão de beleza. O seu maior desafio é dar continuidade com os seus estudos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Narciso comes from Namaacha, province of Maputo. He's 30 years old and a single father of an underage son. He's responsible for his parents.
He has worked for a water company for over 8 years, and he earns an income which he uses for household expenses. With the requested amount he intends to continue building his house by purchasing construction supplies such as bricks and cement. This is his second loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to open a grocery store and a beauty parlor. His biggest challenge is to continue his studies all the way to a college degree.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as bricks and cement.

loans.name: Gleni Medalit

texts.es:
Gleni tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo, vive con su familia en el distrito de La Florida que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de San Miguel, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales principalemente.

Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de guayaquil, contando con herramientas propias, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de guayaquil para incrementar su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para tener más pedidos de sus clientes, ella espera mejorar la calidad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gleni is 29 years old and is a single mother with one child.  She lives with her family in the district of La Florida which is located in the Province of San Miguel, in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru.  Life in her community is calm and the townspeople work mainly in agriculture and raising livestock.  

Gleni works buying and selling the guayaquil plant (used as a medicinal herb and for drinks).  She has her own tools, and counts on more than 3 years of experience in the business with good references from her neighbors.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase a large quantity of of guayaquil in order to grow her business.  This investment will help her meet the greater requests of her customers.  She hopes to increase the quality of her service and thus be able to meet the diverse needs of her customers in the region so that she can generate more income and thereby gain a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of of guayaquil in order to grow her business.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 50 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene dos hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de La Florida, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de San Miguel, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, guayaquil y frutas, cuenta con más de 2 años de experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los vecinos de la zona. Solicita préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a sus cultivos, con esto Santos espera ofrecer un producto de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir incrementar sus ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 50 years old, and he is married and has two children. He lives with his family in the district of La Florida, in a rural area located in the province of San Miguel, in the Cajamarca region on the northern coast of Perú. Life in this district is peaceful, and the people make a living in agriculture and by raising animals.

Santos makes a living growing coffee beans, bamboo and fruit. He has more than 2 year experience doing this work, with very good personal and professional recommendations from neighbors in the area. He is requesting a loan to buy manure and fertilizer to take care of his crops. With this, Santos hopes to offer a higher-quality product to his customers, which is going to enable him to earn more income, and therefore improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to take care of his crops.
